## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>ATGPAT1, GPAT1, sn-2-GPAT1</u>
- **Gene Name:** GLYCEROL-3-PHOSPHATE sn-2-ACYLTRANSFERASE 1, GLYCEROL-3-PHOSPHATE sn-2-ACYLTRANSFERASE 1, GLYCEROL-3-PHOSPHATE sn-2-ACYLTRANSFERASE 1
